info.name: Traveler's Guide to Elysia
info.description: Artist Artworks (and movement-specific additions) for Aurora Builder.
info.author: Michael

description.p: Form.
Sequence: Black → Red (Bludgeoning → Fire).

When you complete this Artwork, you draw a blazing stroke across the battlefield. Choose a direction originating from the Canvas. A line 40 feet long and 10 feet wide extends from the Canvas and lasts for 3 rounds.

ul.li: A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 2d6 fire damage.
The area counts as difficult terrain.
The fire does not ignite unattended objects.

sheet.description: Form — Heavy Stroke. Sequence: Black → Red.

description.p: Sequence: Black → Red (Bludgeoning → Fire)

When you complete this Artwork, you draw a blazing stroke across the battlefield. Choose a direction originating from the Canvas. A line 40 feet long and 10 feet wide extends from the Canvas and lasts for 3 rounds. ● The area becomes burning ground. ● A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 2d6 fire damage. ● The area counts as difficult terrain. ● The fire does not ignite unattended objects.

sheet.description: Artwork: Heavy Stroke (Sequence: Black → Red (Bludgeoning → Fire))

description.p: Sequence: Blue → Black (Cold → Bludgeoning)

When you complete this Artwork, the space around the Canvas locks into rigid stillness. Creatures of your choice in a 15-foot radius centered on the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature’s speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature’s speed is halved until the end of its next turn. In addition, the area in the radius becomes difficult terrain for 3 rounds.

sheet.description: Artwork: Still Frame (Sequence: Blue → Black (Cold → Bludgeoning))

description.p: Sequence: White → Black (Radiant → Bludgeoning)

When you complete this Artwork, a descending arc of judgment strikes downward. Choose a 30-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line extending from the Canvas. Creatures in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 3d6 radiant damage and is knocked prone. ● On a success, the creature takes half damage and is not knocked prone. A creature knocked prone by this effect has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

sheet.description: Artwork: Cleaving Light (Sequence: White → Black (Radiant → Bludgeoning))

description.p: Sequence: Green → Black (Poison → Bludgeoning)

When you complete this Artwork, corrosive force eats away at form and balance. Creatures of your choice in a 10-foot radius centered on the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 2d8 poison damage and has disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half damage with no additional effect. The area remains slick and unstable for 3 rounds, counting as difficult terrain.

sheet.description: Artwork: Eroded Edge (Sequence: Green → Black (Poison → Bludgeoning))

description.p: Sequence: Black → Red → Black (Bludgeoning → Fire → Bludgeoning)

When you complete this Artwork, the Canvas detonates outward with crushing force. Each creature of your choice within a 20-foot radius must make a Dexterity saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 4d6 fire damage, is knocked prone, and is restrained by warped terrain until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half damage and is not restrained. The area becomes difficult terrain for 3 rounds.

sheet.description: Artwork: Collapse the Subject (Sequence: Black → Red → Black (Bludgeoning → Fire → Bludgeoning))

description.p: Sequence: Black → Purple → Black (Bludgeoning → Necrotic → Bludgeoning)

When you complete this Artwork, a lingering sense of inevitability settles over the battlefield. Creatures of your choice in a 30-foot radius centered on the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 3d8 necrotic damage and is Weakened for 3 rounds (its weapon attacks deal half damage). ● On a success, the creature takes half damage and is Weakened until the end of its next turn. A creature reduced to 0 hit points while Weakened by this Artwork cannot be revived until the end of the Artist’s next turn.

sheet.description: Artwork: Mortal Impression (Sequence: Black → Purple → Black (Bludgeoning → Necrotic → Bludgeoning))

description.p: Sequence: Yellow → Blue → Orange (Lightning → Cold → Acid)

When you complete this Artwork, a violent fracture tears outward from the Canvas. Choose a direction originating from the Canvas. A line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide erupts along the ground. Creatures in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 5d6 lightning damage, is knocked prone, and has its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. ● On a success, a creature takes half damage and is not knocked prone. The line becomes unstable terrain for 3 rounds. It counts as difficult terrain, and a creature that moves more than 10 feet within it on a turn must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

sheet.description: Artwork: Horizon Fracture (Sequence: Yellow → Blue → Orange (Lightning → Cold → Acid))

description.p: Sequence: White → Purple → White (Radiant → Necrotic → Radiant)

When you complete this Artwork, a sphere of oppressive stillness forms around the Canvas. A 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the Canvas lasts for 3 rounds. While inside the sphere: ● Creatures cannot regain hit points. ● Creatures have disadvantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration. ● A creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 3d8 radiant damage. The sphere is heavily obscured to creatures outside of it.

sheet.description: Artwork: Cathedral of Silence (Sequence: White → Purple → White (Radiant → Necrotic → Radiant))

description.p: Sequence: Green → Orange → Green (Poison → Acid → Poison)

When you complete this Artwork, corrosive growth spreads outward from the Canvas. A 30-foot-radius area centered on the Canvas becomes warped terrain for 3 rounds. ● The area is difficult terrain. ● A creature that starts its turn in the area must make a Constitution saving throw. ○ On a failure, the creature takes 4d6 acid damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its turn. ○ On a success, the creature takes half damage and suffers no additional effect. Unattended nonmagical objects in the area begin to corrode but are not destroyed instantly.

sheet.description: Artwork: Verdant Undoing (Sequence: Green → Orange → Green (Poison → Acid → Poison))

description.p: Sequence: Yellow → Purple → Blue → White (Lightning → Necrotic → Cold → Radiant)

When you complete this Artwork, gravity bends violently toward the Canvas. A 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the Canvas becomes a collapsing field for 3 rounds. When the field forms, each creature of your choice inside it must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 6d8 force damage and is pulled to the nearest unoccupied space within 10 feet of the Canvas. ● On a success, the creature takes half damage and is not moved. While the field persists: ● The area is difficult terrain. ● A creature that ends its turn more than 10 feet from the Canvas is pulled 10 feet toward it. ● Creatures have disadvantage on Strength saving throws while inside the field. The field collapses harmlessly at the end of the duration.

sheet.description: Artwork: Event Horizon (Sequence: Yellow → Purple → Blue → White (Lightning → Necrotic → Cold → Radiant))

description.p: Sequence: Green → Orange → Purple → White (Poison → Acid → Necrotic → Radiant)

When you complete this Artwork, reality within the Canvas’ reach destabilizes. Choose a 40-foot-radius area centered on the Canvas. For 3 rounds, the area is warped. When the effect begins, creatures of your choice in the area must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 5d10 necrotic damage and gains one level of exhaustion. ● On a success, the creature takes half damage and does not gain exhaustion. While the area persists: ● Creatures cannot regain hit points. ● A creature that drops to 0 hit points within the area cannot regain hit points until it leaves the area.

sheet.description: Artwork: World Unfinished (Sequence: Green → Orange → Purple → White (Poison → Acid → Necrotic → Radiant))

description.p: Sequence: Red → Yellow → Blue → Green (Fire → Lightning → Cold → Poison)

When you complete this Artwork, the Canvas detonates into a storm of unstable elements. Each creature of your choice within a 60-foot radius of the Canvas must make a Dexterity saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 8d6 damage, divided evenly among fire, lightning, cold, and poison. ● On a success, the creature takes half damage. In addition, the ground within 30 feet of the Canvas becomes unstable for 3 rounds: ● The area is difficult terrain. ● A creature that moves more than half its speed on its turn must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

sheet.description: Artwork: The Final Composition (Sequence: Red → Yellow → Blue → Green (Fire → Lightning → Cold → Poison))

description.p: Sequence: Red → Yellow (Fire → Lightning)

A violent line of searing light erupts from the Canvas in a direction of your choice, forming a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line. Creatures in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 2d6 fire damage and 2d6 lightning damage. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage. This effect does not create burning ground.

sheet.description: Artwork: Blazing Oath (Sequence: Red → Yellow (Fire → Lightning))

description.p: Sequence: Red → Purple (Fire → Necrotic)

The Canvas releases a wave of burning grief. Creatures of your choice within 15 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 3d6 fire damage and 2d6 necrotic damage, and it can’t regain hit points until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and can regain hit points normally.

sheet.description: Artwork: Ashen Fugue (Sequence: Red → Purple (Fire → Necrotic))

description.p: Sequence: Red → Yellow → Red (Fire → Lightning → Fire)

The Canvas erupts in a roaring detonation. Creatures of your choice within a 20-foot radius of the Canvas must make a Dexterity saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 6d6 fire damage and 4d6 lightning damage. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage. The area becomes burning ground for 3 rounds. The burning ground deals 2d6 fire damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Inferno’s Arc (Sequence: Red → Yellow → Red (Fire → Lightning → Fire))

description.p: Sequence: Red → Green → Red (Fire → Poison → Fire)

The Canvas flares into toxic flame. Creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 3d8 fire damage and is Poisoned until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and suffers no additional effect.

sheet.description: Artwork: Crimson Ruin (Sequence: Red → Green → Red (Fire → Poison → Fire))

description.p: Sequence: Red → White → Yellow → Red (Fire → Radiant → Lightning → Fire)

A blinding corona of destructive brilliance expands outward. Creatures of your choice within 60 feet of the Canvas must make a Dexterity saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 10d6 total damage, divided as you choose between fire, radiant, and lightning. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage. This effect does not create burning ground.

sheet.description: Artwork: Sun Without Horizon (Sequence: Red → White → Yellow → Red (Fire → Radiant → Lightning → Fire))

description.p: Sequence: Red → Purple → Red → Yellow (Fire → Necrotic → Fire → Lightning)

The Canvas shatters into a storm of flame and grief. Creatures of your choice within 30 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 6d8 necrotic damage and 3d8 fire damage and has disadvantage on its next saving throw before the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage. This effect does not create burning ground.

sheet.description: Artwork: Heartbreak Conflagration (Sequence: Red → Purple → Red → Yellow (Fire → Necrotic → Fire → Lightning))

description.p: Sequence: Pink → Yellow (Psychic → Lightning)

Creatures of your choice within 15 feet of the Canvas must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature: ● Has disadvantage on its next saving throw before the end of its next turn. ● Has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. On a success, the creature is unaffected.

sheet.description: Artwork: Chromatic Dissonance (Sequence: Pink → Yellow (Psychic → Lightning))

description.p: Sequence: Pink → Blue (Psychic → Cold)

Creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the Canvas must make a Wisdom saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 2d6 psychic damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Violent Complement (Sequence: Pink → Blue (Psychic → Cold))

description.p: Sequence: Pink → Yellow → Pink (Psychic → Lightning → Psychic)

Creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the Canvas must make a Wisdom saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 5d6 psychic damage, and it can’t take reactions until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Dissonant Field (Sequence: Pink → Yellow → Pink (Psychic → Lightning → Psychic))

description.p: Sequence: Pink → Green → Pink (Psychic → Poison → Psychic)

Creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the Canvas must make a Wisdom saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 4d8 psychic damage and is Confused until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not Confused.

sheet.description: Artwork: Shattered Harmony (Sequence: Pink → Green → Pink (Psychic → Poison → Psychic))

description.p: Sequence: Pink → Yellow → Blue → Pink (Psychic → Lightning → Cold → Psychic)

Creatures of your choice within 30 feet of the Canvas must make a Wisdom saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 8d6 psychic damage, is Blinded until the end of its next turn, and has disadvantage on its next saving throw before the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not Blinded.

sheet.description: Artwork: Color Without Form (Sequence: Pink → Yellow → Blue → Pink (Psychic → Lightning → Cold → Psychic))

description.p: Sequence: Pink → White → Yellow → Pink (Psychic → Radiant → Lightning → Psychic)

Creatures of your choice within 60 feet of the Canvas must make a Wisdom saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 10d6 total damage, divided as you choose between psychic, radiant, and lightning, and it is Stunned until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not Stunned.

sheet.description: Artwork: Dominion of Contrast (Sequence: Pink → White → Yellow → Pink (Psychic → Radiant → Lightning → Psychic))

description.p: Sequence: White → Blue (Radiant → Cold)

Creatures of your choice within 15 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 2d6 radiant damage and has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Soft Radiance (Sequence: White → Blue (Radiant → Cold))

description.p: Sequence: White → Green (Radiant → Poison)

Creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 2d8 radiant damage and has disadvantage on ability checks until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Gentle Refrain (Sequence: White → Green (Radiant → Poison))

description.p: Sequence: White → Blue → White (Radiant → Cold → Radiant)

Creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 4d8 radiant damage and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Measured Illumination (Sequence: White → Blue → White (Radiant → Cold → Radiant))

description.p: Sequence: White → Green → White (Radiant → Poison → Radiant)

Creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 3d8 radiant damage and is Charmed until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not Charmed.

sheet.description: Artwork: Glimmering Lull (Sequence: White → Green → White (Radiant → Poison → Radiant))

description.p: Sequence: White → Blue → Green → White (Radiant → Cold → Poison → Radiant)

Creatures of your choice within 30 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 8d6 radiant damage, its speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn, and it can’t take reactions until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage.

sheet.description: Artwork: Dawn on the Water (Sequence: White → Blue → Green → White (Radiant → Cold → Poison → Radiant))

description.p: Sequence: White → Yellow → Blue → White (Radiant → Lightning → Cold → Radiant)

Creatures of your choice within 60 feet of the Canvas must make a Constitution saving throw. ● On a failure, a creature takes 10d6 total damage, divided as you choose between radiant, lightning, and cold, and it is Stunned until the end of its next turn. ● On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not Stunned.

sheet.description: Artwork: Light Gathered, Then Gone (Sequence: White → Yellow → Blue → White (Radiant → Lightning → Cold → Radiant))
